description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMalaria for IMMZ.D2.DT.Malaria. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a malaria vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO)
